backend/main.mo: Core Motoko canister managing user profiles, songs with metadata and media blobs, likes and play counts, and user/official playlists with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected files, components, and tests for authentication, sign‑in modal, and pending‑action systems.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each frontend file’s purpose across layout, hooks, components, and screens.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme setup defining OKLCH variables for light/dark modes and applying global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document loading the app with manifest, icons, metadata, and mounting point for React.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme colors, display mode, and categories.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker handling install, cache cleanup, and fetch strategies with special handling for audio requests.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring providers, screen navigation, deep link handling, welcome popup, pending action hook, and SignInModal.
frontend/src/components/branding/AppHead: Header displaying the app logo, title, and subtitle with styling.
frontend/src/components/home/HomeChannel: Banner editor allowing users to upload, link, or clear a custom channel image with preview and notifications.
Main layout wrapper with header, sidebar, starfield background, footer, and bottom tab bar.
frontend/src/components/library/LibraryP: Playlist management panel enabling viewing and creating playlists with auth handling and dialogs.
frontend/src/components/library/LibraryT: Simple tab selector for switching between songs and playlists in the library.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Bottom navigation bar with tabs for main screens and active-state styling.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Sideb: Sidebar navigation menu for desktop and mobile with install prompt support.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/First: Welcome popup for first-time users offering guest mode or Internet Identity sign‑in.
frontend/src/components/player/MusicPlay: Audio player component handling playback, seeking, volume, play count updates, and next/previous navigation.
frontend/src/components/pwa/A2HSBanner.t: Displays an install prompt banner for adding the PWA to the home screen with dismiss persistence.
frontend/src/components/SignInModal.tsx: Responsive sign‑in modal/drawer that triggers Internet Identity login and handles cancel logic.
frontend/src/components/songs/CreatePlay: Dialog/drawer for creating a playlist and adding a song, with auth handling and async mutations.
frontend/src/components/songs/DownloadCh: Dialog/drawer offering offline caching or direct device download options for a song.
frontend/src/components/songs/Horizontal: Compact horizontal song card with artwork, play button, and engagement bar.
Scrollable horizontal row displaying a titled collection of song cards.
frontend/src/components/songs/PlaylistCh: Dialog/drawer allowing users to toggle song membership in playlists with auth and loading states.
frontend/src/components/songs/SongCard.t: Song card with artwork, play, delete, and overflow actions plus engagement info.
frontend/src/components/songs/SongEditor: Dialog-based form for adding songs with file-to-DataURL handling, validation, and submission via useAddSong.
frontend/src/components/songs/SongEngage: Displays like and play counts with optional like button using useSongEngagement.
frontend/src/components/songs/SongListRo: Renders a song row with artwork, play/delete controls, and engagement bar.
frontend/src/components/songs/SongOverfl: Provides song actions like favorites, playlists, downloads, and sharing with auth checks and mobile drawer support.
frontend/src/components/songs/SongsSortB: Sort selector allowing users to choose latest, most liked, or most heard.
frontend/src/components/visual/Starfield: Generates an animated starfield in dark mode using DOM elements and settings.
frontend/src/config/featureFlags.ts: Defines feature flags, currently enabling desktop bottom tab bar.
frontend/src/context/AuthContext.tsx: Auth context managing authentication state, pending actions, and sign‑in modal workflow.
frontend/src/hooks/useA2HS.ts: Hook detecting A2HS installability and managing deferred install prompt.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages authenticated or anonymous backend actors with query invalidation on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useFirstLaunchWelcome: Tracks and shows a first‑launch welcome modal using localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useHomeBanner.ts: Manages home banner image state with localStorage persistence and supports URL or file uploads.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity restoration, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Offers hooks to check media query matches and detect mobile viewport.
frontend/src/hooks/usePendingAction.ts: Executes deferred user actions after authentication and handles retries or errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for song and playlist operations backed by the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useSettings.ts: Stores and updates user settings with localStorage sync and UI effects such as reduced animations.
frontend/src/hooks/useSongEngagement.ts: Handles liking and playing songs, triggering auth when necessary.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages light/dark theme state with persistence and DOM class updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup plus extensive light/dark CSS variables and global UI styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that mounts React with query and identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutArtistScreen.tsx: Displays an artist bio with social links and support buttons.
frontend/src/pages/ContactScreen.tsx: Shows contact info and a button to email the artist.
frontend/src/pages/CustomSongRequestsScr: Explains custom song requests and provides support and email links.
frontend/src/pages/HomeScreen.tsx: Loads all songs, shows new/top sections, provides playback controls, and manages song deletion.
frontend/src/pages/LibraryScreen.tsx: Displays the user's library with tabs for songs and playlists plus an integrated music player.
frontend/src/pages/SearchScreen.tsx: Allows song searching with live results and a music player for search matches.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsScreen.tsx: Provides UI for changing audio, visual, and notification settings using switches and selects.
frontend/src/pages/SongsScreen.tsx: Shows all songs with sorting, deletion, deep-link handling, and a music player.
frontend/src/pages/SupportScreen.tsx: Displays a support page with a card encouraging donations via Buy Me a Coffee.
frontend/src/pages/ThemesScreen.tsx: Provides UI for switching between dark and light themes using buttons and icons.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker on window load and logs success or failure.
frontend/src/utils/deepLinks.ts: Creates, parses, and clears song deep-link URL parameters for hash and query routing.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Provides helpers for validating audio URLs, generating filenames, and triggering song downloads.
frontend/src/utils/offlineAudioCache.ts: Implements caching, checking, removing, and clearing of offline audio files using the Cache API.
frontend/src/utils/share.ts: Offers Web Share API helpers and clipboard fallback for sharing text or song links.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Retrieves, stores, persists, and clears URL parameters across query and hash routing using sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for styling.
project_state.json: Defines current project version and detailed requirements for the MVRIO Night PWA, including UI rules, authentication flow, A2HS behavior, and navigation/theme specifications. Lists architectural notes and known issues affecting builds and UI color behavior.
